forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 21C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and a few afternoon clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 73F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine. High 22C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 73F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 42F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 10C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 52F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low around 0C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 34F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by some light rain later in the day. Thunder possible. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 0C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 34F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 59F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening, then clear overnight. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening, then clear overnight. Low 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later in the day. High near 60F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 37F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny early followed by increasing clouds and a few showers later in the day. High around 15C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine in the morning giving way to clouds and a few showers during the afternoon. High 62F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 2C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 38F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 17C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 66F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low near 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 19C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 69F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.
